'''Favonius Bladework - Weiss''' is [[Albedo]]'s [[Normal Attack]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Albedo's Plunging Attack is identical to that of [[Bennett]]'s [[Strike of Fortune]], and is marginally faster than other sword users.

==Trivia==
* The pattern produced by Albedo's 4th Normal Attack also changes color if his attacks are [[Elemental Infusion|infused]] with an element.
* When read together with the name of Eula's Normal Attack, [[Favonius Bladework - Edel]], the two talents are a reference to the {{w|Leontopodium nivale|edelweiss flower}}.
** The name of the edelweiss flower is a combination of the German words {{wt|edel#German|edel}}, "nobility" and {{wt|weiß#German|weiß}} "white." This matches the name meanings of the two talents in the game's Chinese text: "Favonius Sword-Art - Imperial Clan" {{Lang|zh=西风剑术・宗室}}, and "Favonius Swordsmanship - White" {{Lang|zh=西风剑术・白}}.
